messages.author: Sergey Ulanov
messages.text: nit: It's more common to say something like "UserInputMonitor overrides". UserInputMonitor is not an interface, so this comment may be confusing.

messages.author: Sergey Ulanov
messages.text: nit: class declaration should be before the methods.

messages.author: Sergey Ulanov
messages.text: nit: Operators normally should not be wrapped, i.e. ? should be on the previous line. Ignore me if you used clang-format to format this code.

messages.author: Sergey Ulanov
messages.text: nit: empty lines between methods please.

messages.author: jiayl
messages.text:

> nit: It's more common to say something like "UserInputMonitor overrides".
> UserInputMonitor is not an interface, so this comment may be confusing.

Done.
